overview:
SutiCRM is an online CRM solution that automates the entire customer relationship management process. Manage campaigns to prospects, leads to opportunities, and forecasts to quotes. Additional functionality enables companies to manage sales orders, invoices, contracts and support cases.

SutiCRM helps salespersons and management become more efficient and effective in winning new business. It enables both direct and indirect sales teams to close deals faster through a single interface for updating deal information, tracking opportunity milestones, and recording all opportunity-related interactions.

By providing one unified view of multiple sales leads, opportunities, quotes and forecasts, SutiCRM can help sales management and personnel to be more efficient and effective in winning new business. SutiCRM enables both direct and indirect sales teams to close deals faster through a single interface for updating deal information, tracking opportunity milestones, and recording all opportunity-related interactions.
